title: Meta plans to cut thousands of jobs, after CEO predicted no more layoffs
description: The Facebook parent company plans to push some leaders into lower-level roles, flattening layers of management at the social media giant

title: How to secure your Twitter account free
description: Twitter is disabling text two-factor authentication in one month unless users pay a monthly fee. However, there are safer, no-cost alternatives.

title: Russian propagandists said to buy Twitter blue-check verifications
description: As the Ukraine war enters its second year, the presence of accounts pushing Russian propaganda on Twitter has skyrocketed.

title: Flooded with AI-created content, a sci-fi magazine suspends submissions
description: Clarkesworld, which does not accept works created with artificial intelligence, banned more than 500 accounts that submitted entries in February.
